long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create any chrome extension you can imagine. With basic Javascript knowledge and a few clicks you can build complex extensions that will make your life as a developer easier.

In addition to many other features, in extensionMaker you can find:
-Code creation and reuse.
-Creation and reuse of buttons with functionality without using css.
-Menu generation without writing code.
-Creation of functional extensions with graphical editor.
-Share extensions with other users in an easy way.
